thread.title: Watch the 74th Annual Golden Globes Cold Open!
thread.title_full: Watch the 74th Annual Golden Globes Cold Open!

author: CS
title: Watch the 74th Annual Golden Globes Cold Open!
text:
SHARE Watch the 74th Annual Golden Globes cold open! 
You can now watch the star-studded cold open from the 74th Annual Golden Globes online! Check out Jimmy Fallon and special guests in the player below! 
You can check out the full list of winners and nominees by clicking here . Almost 100 red carpet photos can be viewed here as well. 
Produced by dick clark productions in association with the HFPA, the Golden Globe Awards are viewed in more than 236 countries worldwide and are one of the few awards ceremonies to include both motion picture and television achievements. Lorenzo Soria is President of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association. Allen Shapiro, CEO of dick clark productions; Mike Mahan, President of dick clark productions; and Barry Adelman, Executive VP of Television at dick clark productions, will serve as executive producers. Oh, la la! Watch and dance along to the #GoldenGlobes cold open. pic.twitter.com/k6QEv2zfda
